Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I thought to forward it here in case you haven't seen it yet (@Squad). It's an obviously fake KSP game for mobile android devices.

amazon-link: [http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00YHWDNZG](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00YHWDNZG) 

original Reddit-link: [https://de.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/3eg852/scam_ksp_android_game/](https://de.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/3eg852/scam_ksp_android_game/)

Best regards, KE
Probably someone in a foreign country where he can't be touched. If you look at his profile he is scamming a bunch of games like that. Hopefully Amazon gets it removed quick.

Not surprising. Hopefully Amazon will take it down, but before that happens I hope people will read the reviews saying it is malware. I feel bad for you android users who have to deal with scams and malware.
Don't count on Amazon removing it (unless perhaps if Squad files a complaint). It's been up there since late May already...
I mentioned this to the higher-ups to see what can be done. Thanks for bringing it up.

This so needs to be destroyed with fire.

This comment was not very helpful but the others are.

> 
> *0 of 9 people found the following review helpful*
> 
> [*5one YouTube channel play this game*](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/RHTSBKJ03MOI0/ref=cm_cr_pr_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B00YHWDNZG)
> 
> *By*[*Jennifer Sweed*](https://www.amazon.com/gp/pdp/profile/AKV4BT1Y6GS00/ref=cm_cr_pr_pdp?ie=UTF8)*on June 19, 2015*
> 
> [*Verified Purchase*](https://www.amazon.com/MartinJacob-Kerbal-Space-Program-Game/product-reviews/B00YHWDNZG/ref=cm_cr_pr_rvw_rvwer?ie=UTF8&reviewerType=avp_only_reviews&sortBy=bySubmissionDateDescending)
> 
> *COOl game ya should play this game*

Total malware and all much brad engrish.

> Brilliant and famous game contains a lot of pictures of the rearranged game will never tire of them.

 **Product Description**

 For all fans out there, Intensity of a Kerbal Space Program Game, now on your mobile!!! Welcome to the most authentic,complete and mind Logic for Android smartphones and tablets .Play the Multilevel Mode Challenge to you for your mind! You can play the game in 4 different Stages.Pick any stored photo o take one and transform it to a slide puzzle. There's 4 grid sizes (2\*3, 3\*4 , 5\*6 and 8\*10) to play.Split and merge your friend's face and unlocking every level. The levels include high quality photos You can compete with your friends with the online ranking or try to solve all puzzles with 3 stars.Brilliant and famous game contains a lot of pictures of the rearranged game will never tire of them. Try to resolve it with little movements! 

* * *
**Technical Details**

- **Size:** 2MB
- **Version:** 1.0
- **Developed By:** MartinJacob
- **Application Permissions:** ([Help me understand what permissions mean](https://www.amazon.com/mas/permissions/?_encoding=UTF8&ref_=mas_dp_perm))  

    - Read only access to device state
    - Read from external storage
    - Allows installation of home screen shortcuts
    - **Open windows using the type TYPE\_SYSTEM\_ALERT, shown on top of all other applications**
    - **Get notified that the operating system has finished booting**
    - Get information about the currently or recently running tasks: a thumbnail representation of the tasks, what activities are running in it, etc
    - Open network sockets
    - Write to external storage
    - Access fine (e.g., GPS) location
    - Access information about Wi-Fi networks
    - Access coarse (e.g., Cell-ID, Wi-Fi) location
    - Access the list of accounts in the Accounts Service
    - Access information about networks
    - Allows an application to read (but not write) the user's browsing history and bookmarks

    [\*]**Minimum Operating System:** Android 2.2 

    [\*]**Approximate Download Time:** Less than 30 seconds

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-24T17:55:55Z" title="07/24/2015 05:55  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 24, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**

Look at the history of the scumbag who posted the game:

[http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=bl_sr_mobile-apps?_encoding=UTF8&field-brandtextbin=MartinJacob&node=2350149011](https://www.amazon.com/s/ref=bl_sr_mobile-apps?_encoding=UTF8&field-brandtextbin=MartinJacob&node=2350149011)

Looks like he's been busy ripping off copyrighted materials for a long time with no consequences...

Do people actually install garbage like this? the mind boggles.

Check out all the other scams this "developer" has released.

Please, for the love of Jeb, pay attention to what you're downloading folks.

> 
> Don't count on Amazon removing it (unless perhaps if Squad files a complaint). It's been up there since late May already...

Squad can issue a cease and desist to Amazon. That is a worst case scenario, but if people mistake this for a Squad product it can hurt sales of the real game. That is very damaging and it is why Trademark laws exist.

On a side note, how come no one has made a VAB/SPH for android yet?! ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

I want to build ships while at work, dammit!
I sometimes do... remote desktop etc. But I didn't say that, did I?
Buy it and sue amazon for damages ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> On a side note, how come no one has made a VAB/SPH for android yet?! ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
> I want to build ships while at work, dammit!

Oh, so much that. Official/Nonscam, please ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Yes, looks like it's been taken care. Thank you for pointing it out. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
